K10sf74_sc:sc2_0: evaṁ mayā śrutam ekasmiṁ samaye bhagavāṁ rājagṛhe viharati devadattaṁ lābha satkāra
K10sf74_sc:sc2_1: ślokam ārabhya bhikṣūn āmantrayati | candropamā bhikṣavo viharata | nityaṁ navakā
K10sf74_sc:sc2_2: iva hrīmantaḥ kuleṣv apragalbhā avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkramata |
K10sf74_sc:sc2_3: tad yathā cakṣuṣmāṁ puruṣo jarodapānaṁ vā nadīdurgaṁ vā parvata viṣamaṁ vā avakṛṣya
K10sf74_sc:sc2_4: kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ vyavalokayed evam eva candropamā viharata nityaṁ navakā iva
K10sf74_sc:sc2_5: hrīmantaḥ kuleṣv apragalbhā avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkramata |
K10sf74_sc:sc2_6: kāśyapo hi bhikṣuś candropamo viharati nityaṁ navaka iva hrīmān kuleṣv apragalbho
K10sf74_sc:sc2_7: ’vakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkramati | tad yathā cakṣuṣmāṁ puruṣo
K10sf74_sc:sc2_8: jarodapānaṁ vā nadī durgaṁ vā parvata viṣamaṁ vā avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ vyavalokayed
K10sf74_sc:sc2_9: evam eva kāśyapo hi bhikṣuś candropamo viharati nityaṁ navaka iva hrīmāṁ kuleṣv apragalbhaḥ
K10sf74_sc:sc2_10: avakṛṣya kāyam avakṛṣya cittaṁ kulāny upasaṁkrāmati | kiṁ manyatha …
